description: Sentence types and examples for TTS training data

malay: Selamat pagi, terima kasih kerana menghubungi perkhidmatan pelanggan kami.
Selamat sejahtera, saya Aisha dari bahagian khidmat pelanggan.
Assalamualaikum dan selamat petang, apa yang boleh saya bantu hari ini?
english: Good morning, thank you for calling our customer service.
Hello, this is Ahmad from the customer support team.
Good afternoon, how may I assist you today?
code_switching: Hello, selamat pagi, welcome to our customer service line.
Good morning, terima kasih for calling us today.

malay: Baik, saya faham permintaan encik.
Betul, saya sudah catat nombor akaun tersebut.
Saya sudah terima maklumat yang diperlukan.
english: Alright, I understand your request.
Yes, I have noted down your account number.
I have received the required information.
code_switching: Ok, I understand your concern. Let me check for you.
Baik, I got it. Give me a moment to verify.
Noted, saya akan process your request now.

malay: Baki akaun semasa anda ialah lima ribu tiga ratus ringgit.
Transaksi terakhir anda adalah pada hari Isnin lepas.
Penyata akaun akan dihantar melalui emel dalam masa tiga hari bekerja.
english: Your current account balance is five thousand three hundred ringgit.
Your last transaction was on Monday.
The statement will be sent via email within three working days.
code_switching: Your balance sekarang is five thousand ringgit lebih.
Transaction status dia still pending, estimated dalam 24 hours.
Ok so your account statement akan keluar end of this month.

malay: Boleh saya tahu nombor akaun anda untuk pengesahan?
Nama penuh yang didaftar dalam akaun apa ya?
Adakah ini nombor telefon yang betul untuk dihubungi?
english: May I have your account number for verification?
What is the full name registered on the account?
Is this the correct phone number to contact you?
code_switching: Boleh you provide your account number for verification?
Can I get your IC number untuk confirm identity?
What transaction date yang you nak check?

malay: Sila masukkan kod TAC yang dihantar ke telefon anda.
Untuk aktivasi kad, sila hubungi nombor di belakang kad.
Anda perlu ke cawangan terdekat untuk menukar kata laluan.
english: Please enter the TAC code sent to your phone.
To activate your card, please call the number on the back.
You will need to visit the nearest branch to change your password.
code_switching: Ok, please click on the verification link dalam email you.
You kena key in the OTP yang we sent to your phone.
Just follow the steps dalam app, confirm transaction tu.

malay: Maaf atas kesulitan yang berlaku, kami akan selesaikan segera.
Minta maaf kerana perlu menunggu lama.
Saya mohon maaf, sistem kami sedang mengalami gangguan.
english: I apologize for the inconvenience, we will resolve this promptly.
Sorry for the long wait.
I apologize, our system is currently experiencing issues.
code_switching: Sorry ya, system kita tengah slow sikit now.
Maaf for the delay, let me check with my supervisor.
I apologize tau, this shouldn't have happened.

malay: Terima kasih kerana menghubungi kami, selamat hari raya.
Ada apa-apa lagi yang boleh saya bantu?
Terima kasih, semoga hari anda ceria.
english: Thank you for calling, have a great day.
Is there anything else I can help you with?
Thank you for your patience, goodbye.
code_switching: Thank you for calling ya, have a good day!
Ok, anything else I can help you dengan?
Terima kasih, take care and goodbye!
